Traffic problems would become a thing of the past as flying cars could take off and land vertically in urban areas, reducing congestion on roads and highways.
Human life expectancy could potentially increase as flying could reduce the need for long-distance transportation and thus reduce exposure to harmful pollutants and diseases.
With the ability to fly, humans could explore the world in ways that were previously impossible, such as reaching remote locations or even exploring space.
People may develop new social norms around flying, such as having designated landing zones or establishing rules around who is allowed to fly where.
The military may have to adapt to new tactics and technologies as they could gain an advantage over their enemies with the ability to fly.
